1.content:
are you a male or female?

pichu?
1.title: lets start

111.content: ok your name is logan. where does the story start?
111.title: Logan

1111.content: you were walking through a forest one day when you saw a glowing tree leaf. do you pick it up?
1111.title: forest

choices: run you dont know what its going to do to you
stay you dont think itll hurt you
11111.content: you picked up the leaf and you started to feel weird. all of a sudden the trees looked like they were getting bigger. "How are the trees getting bigger? Wait a second.... theyr not getting bigger, im getting smaller!" you say. after you stopped shrinking you saw a big yellow wall in front of you. do you run or stay
11111.title: yes

choices: ...your home, where you might get help from your parents.
111111.content:
The yellow wall was large, fuzzy, and it seemed to be throbbing, of all things. Too frightened to comprehend what it was, you ran away as fast as you could.

Unfortunately, you didn't get very far as a large shadow leaped on top of you, causing you to fall. You tried to get up and run away again, but something large and fuzzy had gotten a hold of you, and it wasn't letting go. Terrified, you slowly turned to face it, afraid of what you might see.

Your fear quickly turned to shock when you realized that a tall Pichu had you in it's grasp! A very tall Pichu...

Putting two and two together, you realized that the giant wall from earlier was in fact, a normal sized Pichu.

Shocked, you watched as the Pichu lifted you to your feet and dusted off the dirt on your body, before handing you a rather large leaf.

"...what's the leaf for?" you asked, confused.

The Pichu merely smiled and looked at your body. Interested you looked down, and for the third time that day, you were shocked again.

Your clothes had NOT shrunken with you

With a massive blush, you took the leaf from the Pichu and wrapped it around your torso. Muttering a quick thanks, you poked a few holes in the leaf so that you could tie it to it's stem, preventing it from falling off you. Now clothed, you looked at the Pichu and thanked it properly.

"Pichu Pi!" was it's happy response.

You then asked it if it could help you reach someplace, knowing that since you were now shrunk, you were in no condition to be traveling. The Pichu agreed, before turning around on all fours and patting it's back. Getting the message, you jumped on and told the Pichu to take you to...
111111.title: Run, you don't know what it might do to you!

111112.content: you decide not to run. when you looked up at it it was a pichu! you were backing away when you tripped. the pichu grabbed you before you could fall. "pichu?" she asked. "i guess you can see me" you say. is she mean or nice?
111112.title: stay you dont think itll hurt you

1111121.content: you decide shes nice and dont do anything. she takes you to her home in the forest. by the time you get there it is night. the pichu goes to bed do you go with her?
1111121.title: nice

11111211.content: Judging by the position of the moon you guess it is about 3:00 am so you go with her since you dont have anywhere else to go. you follow her into a cave and you see some leafs on the ground near the center of the cave. you see the pichu heading towards there so you follow her. you and the pichu fall asleep.
11111211.title: yes

choices: go over to her to try to wake her up
111112111.content: you woke up during the night to find the pichu moving around. you try to tell her to to wake up but she doesent. what do you do?
111112111.title: during the night

1111121111.content: you decide to go over to her. when you get there you try to wake her up but you get caught in her arms. when that happened she stopped moving around and you quickly fell asleep.
1111121111.title: go over to her to try to wake her up

choices: Playing a fun game with you
11111211111.content: You wake up the next morning to find the adorable giantess pichu staring down at you. It seemed as though she had been waiting for you to wake up, and you wondered how long she had been standing over you like that. When she sees your eyes open, the pichu smiles and picks you up off the ground before...
11111211111.title: in the morning

choices: Ok I'll eat! I love breakfast!
Fruit!? Yuck get it away from me!
111112111112.content: The giant Pikachu sets you down on a Rock with two small logs next to it that reminds you of a table, and walks over to a pile of huge leafs and picks up two leafs and walks over to another pile of Chesto berries, Cheri berries, and Oran berries. She puts 2 of every berry on one leaf, then puts 1of each berry on the other leaf, and sets the leaf with 1 of each berry in front of you, and sits down on the log in front of you. Pikachu points to the leaf with berries in frount of you "Pika chu pik pika, chu pik! (Heres your breakfast little one, eat it all up!)" Pikachu says in an exited tone.
111112111112.title: Getting some breakfast for you

11111211112.content:
in your dream you saw a orb. the orb spoke to you. "I am the one that shrunk you" it said "Why" you asked it. "Because, i wanted you to play a game with me." then the orb showed its true form. It was Mew! "I am lonely" she said. "But you dont have to worry" mew added. "Why shouldnt i worry? I'm 1 foot tall!" "Because i have given you telekinesis so you can get around, durability so you wont get hurt with small pressure, abl eto understand pokemon so you arent confused about what they say, and accelerated healing in case you get injured" she replied. "Oh, then im not worried." you said. then you woke up and decided to test your powers. you saw a rock on the other side of the cave and decided to try to pick it up. you focused on it and it hovered in the air. then you put it back down. then the pichu woke up. "Pichu?"she said "good morning" you said to her. "Pi Pichu (good morning)" She replied
. where do you go next






click this for a picture of a orb. http://th191.photobucket.com/albums/z277...
11111211112.title: dream

111112111121.content: You go to the forest with the pichu to collect berries. When you get there you see the pichu get knocked down by something. you look and see a arbok what do you do?
111112111121.title: forest

1111121111211.content: You decided to attack the arbok back using your powers. you saw a boulder behind the arbok. you used your powers to pick it up and hurled it at the arbok. the arbok got knocked out. you won. you went to the pichu and asked "Are you ok?" "Pi pichu pi pichu (yea, ill be ok)" she replied. what next?
1111121111211.title: attack back

111112111121122.content: this is the last one
111112111121122.title: more

1111121111211221.content: "Pi pichu pi pichu pi pichupi(why dont you meet my friends?)" the pichu asked. "Sure" you replied "PICHU!(yay)" she said. When you and her got there you saw a.....
1111121111211221.title: you meet her friends

11111211112112212.content: when you got there the first thing you saw was a lillipup. behind it you saw a Emolga, eevee, and a zorua. "pup! pup! (hi)" the lillipup said. "eevee! (hello)" said the eevee. "hi" said zorua. "hi." you responded, a little nervous. "what are we going to do with him?" asked zorua. "Pi pichu pi pi pi pichu? (why dont we play a game?) asked pichu. "sure." you and zorua say in unision. "what game?" you ask.
11111211112112212.title: lillipup

111112111121122121.content: "why dont we play hide and seek" you suggested. "that sounds fun" the zorua said. "Emol" Emolga said happily" "pichu" said the pichu. "Pup" replied lillipup. "Eevee" said the eevee ecstatically. "Whose the seeker first?" asked zorua.
111112111121122121.title: hide and seek

1111121122.content: You are awakened by daylight filtering through the entrance of the cave. You open your eyes, looking confused for a few moments, before memories of what happened yesterday start to fill your mind. You notice that Pichu is nowhere in sight. You try to get up, but a strong force is keeping you still. You just notice that your back is pressed against a soft surface. Looking down, you see two yellow objects wrapped around your waist. You put two and two together and finally understand. A huge blush appears on your face as you look behind yourself. As you thought, Pichu cuddled up to you in the night, her tight grip keeping you from moving. You blush more intensely now as you start struggling to free yourself from the mouse pokemon's tight embrace. Pichu seems to feel your struggles and wakes up. She releases you from her hug and begins to stir. She then opens her dark eyes and looks around, slotting you on the ground. Pichu stares at you for a second, trying to remember who are you. After recognizing you, she picks you from the ground and encloses you in another hug "Pi pi pichu (good morning little one)" she says. You barely reach the height of her belly, even though Pichu is usually a very small pokemon. The mouse pokemon continues hugging you for a few more minutes, before releasing you. She then starts to walk towards the entrance of the cave, motioning for you to follow. You do as she wants. Exiting the cave, you are immediately blasted by the sunlight. You have to cover your eyes. When you open them, you find Pichu staring down at you with a smile...
1111121122.title: morning

15.content: You're a shrunken human male who fortunately, or unfortunately, runs into a giant pichu. Your name is _________, and the pichus name is _________
15.title: pick one for me

info.brief_description: you shrink with a pichu from pokemon
info.description: you shrink with a pichu from pokemon. the pichu takes care of you. please try to keep the rating at E. means no killing, only mild gore (for example "my ribs felt like they would crack", no sexual stuff, etc, etc. no early ending. means no ending after 2nd chapter unless you pick a way that the shrinking wont happen. please review. The pichu MAY have a name but doesent have to. thank you.
